results.idea: Immediate post-news 10-minute momentum (cross-sectional)
results.description: Use news_pct_10min as a short-term momentum signal. Applied SUGGESTION1 partially (single strong datafield chosen for clarity). SUGGESTION2 N/A (field not vector). SUGGESTION3 N/A (coverage 0.7657>0.6). SUGGESTION4 considered (alphaCount moderate). Kept implementation short per KEEP_IN_MINDs. Confidence: 0.60

results.idea: Post-news 30-minute momentum normalized by 30-day vol surprise
results.description: Combine news_pct_30min and news_vol_stddev to scale momentum by volume surprise. Applied SUGGESTION1 (multiple fields). SUGGESTION3 N/A (coverage high). Operators kept <=7. Confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Reversion after extreme EOD high relative to TONLast
results.description: Use news_high_exc_stddev to detect extreme post-news highs; short extreme positive values. SUGGESTION1 minimal (single informative field). SUGGESTION4 considered (alphaCount decent). Confidence: 0.55

results.idea: Earnings surprise immediate reaction (EOD close move)
results.description: Use news_eps_actual to capture EPS-driven moves; expect continuation/lags. SUGGESTION1 not applied (single field) because eps is highly predictive. Coverage high so SUGGESTION3 N/A. Confidence: 0.65

results.idea: Post-news relative performance vs SPY (short-term)
results.description: Use news_indx_perf to find stocks outperforming the index post-news; long outperformers. Applied SUGGESTION1 lightly. Coverage high. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Open-gap continuation filtered by 30d ATR
results.description: Combine news_open_gap and news_atr14 to prefer gaps large relative to volatility for continuation. Applied SUGGESTION1 (2 fields) and SUGGESTION4 (atr high userCount). Confidence: 0.60

results.idea: Volume-accelerated post-news move (momentum)
results.description: Scale news_pct_5_min by news_ratio_vol (curr vs mov vol) to capture moves with unusual volume. SUGGESTION1 used. news_ratio_vol coverage 0.5122 (<0.6) but I didn't ts_backfill because recent obs are sufficient; applied cautiously. Confidence: 0.57

results.idea: Mean-revert after large intraday session range
results.description: Use news_session_range_pct to detect large intra-day ranges and short extremes expecting reversion. SUGGESTION3: coverage low (0.268) so ts_backfill applied in implementation. Confidence: 0.50

results.idea: Pre-news pre-vwap vs post-vwap drift
results.description: Use news_pre_vwap and news_post_vwap gap to detect drift; multiple fields used per SUGGESTION1. Coverage both >0.7. Confidence: 0.59

results.idea: Short interest momentum-augmented reversals
results.description: High news_short_interest combined with negative short-term pct move tends to mean-revert. Used news_short_interest and news_pct_30min (SUGGESTION1). Both have good coverage. Confidence: 0.63

results.idea: After-hours surge continuing into session (pre-market test)
results.description: Use nws12_afterhsz_1_minute (post-hours 1-min pct) and news_open to capture continuation into open. SUGGESTION1 used; coverage moderate. Confidence: 0.52

results.idea: Cheap valuation breakout (PE-adjusted move)
results.description: Combine news_pe_ratio and news_pct_120min: high pct move in low PE names signals higher continuation. SUGGESTION1 applied; both fields high coverage. Confidence: 0.56

results.idea: Market-relative small-cap surge fade
results.description: Use news_cap and news_indx_perf: small caps (low cap) that massively outperform may revert. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage solid. Confidence: 0.48

results.idea: Rapid minute-based breakout strength (1-min)
results.description: Use news_pct_1min zscored cross-sectionally to capture microbreakouts. SUGGESTION2 N/A. Coverage high. Confidence: 0.54

results.idea: Volume-normalized 60-min momentum
results.description: Scale news_pct_60min by news_mov_vol (30d mov vol) to prefer strong moves in thin names. SUGGESTION1 used. Both coverages high. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Post-news max up amplitude momentum
results.description: Use news_max_up_ret as strength metric (higher -> long). Single-field simple alpha. SUGGESTION1 not applied to keep signal pure. Coverage decent. Confidence: 0.55

results.idea: Post-news max down amplitude mean-revert
results.description: Use news_max_dn_ret to find large down-moves that may mean-revert intraday. Single field used. SUGGESTION3 N/A (coverage 0.9704). Confidence: 0.57

results.idea: Early session tick-activity breakout (tot ticks)
results.description: Use news_tot_ticks as liquidity/attention proxy combined with news_pct_30sec to find tick-driven momentum; SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence: 0.53

results.idea: Open gap fade when volume low
results.description: Fade large news_open_gap when news_open_vol is low (lack of follow-through). Used news_open_gap and news_open_vol (SUGGESTION1). news_open_vol coverage low (0.4361) so used ts_backfill in implementation. Confidence: 0.49

results.idea: Momentum persistence measured by 5-min and 30-min agreement
results.description: Long only when news_pct_5_min and news_pct_30min both positive (consensus momentum). SUGGESTION1 applied. Simple multiply to enforce agreement. Confidence: 0.61

results.idea: High intraday volatility continuation (ATR ratio)
results.description: Use news_atr_ratio to find days with large range relative to 20d ATR; expect continuation in direction of early move (use news_pct_10min). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.56

results.idea: Pre-market stronger than SPY leads to long at open
results.description: Compare news_pre_vwap vs news_spy_last to detect relative strength pre-open using news_pre_vwap and news_spy_last (SUGGESTION1). Coverage high. Confidence: 0.50

results.idea: EOD vwap vs TONLast reversal signal
results.description: If news_eod_vwap is below ton last price suggests selling pressure; use reverse of difference. SUGGESTION1 minimal. Coverage high. Confidence: 0.52

results.idea: Slow mean-revert using 120-min percent and 30-day vol
results.description: Scale news_pct_120min by news_vol_stddev to identify idiosyncratic moves to mean-revert. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.59

results.idea: Price impact estimate: open gap times current volume
results.description: Multiply news_open_gap by news_curr_vol to capture sizable impactful moves likely to continue. SUGGESTION1 used. news_curr_vol coverage 0.7769. Confidence: 0.54

results.idea: Short-term reversal after extreme 30-sec spike
results.description: Reverse large news_pct_30sec values (quick spikes) expecting pullback. Single field; coverage high. Confidence: 0.51

results.idea: Sustained momentum: 10min followed by 60min agreement
results.description: Require same direction of news_pct_10min and news_pct_60min via multiply to emphasize sustained moves. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.60

results.idea: Unusual post-news vwap gap normalized by 30d range
results.description: Divide news_eod_vwap - news_ton_last by news_range_stddev to detect outsized vwap shifts. SUGGESTION1 used. news_range_stddev coverage 0.6172 (>0.6). Confidence: 0.57

results.idea: Intraday liquidity breakout weighted by mov_vol
results.description: Multiply news_pct_5_min by news_mov_vol to favor high-liquidity breakouts. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.55

results.idea: Post-news microstructure: ticks per minute momentum
results.description: Use news_tot_ticks and news_pct_1min to capture tick-driven momentum; SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.53

results.idea: Fade announcements with little movement but high short interest
results.description: Combine low news_pct_30min with high news_short_interest to anticipate squeeze-driven moves later (contrarian). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.47

results.idea: Immediate mean-revert when post-news high exceeds 1sd
results.description: Use news_high_exc_stddev>1 as threshold; reverse signal. SUGGESTION1 minimal. Implement using if_else is avoided to keep short; using reverse and zscore. Confidence: 0.52

results.idea: Pre-open gap continuation when SPY also gaps
results.description: Require news_open_gap to be same sign as news_spy_last - news_spy_close via multiply of news_open_gap and (news_spy_close - news_spy_last). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.50

results.idea: Rapid 2-minute momentum filtered by 30min trend
results.description: Multiply news_pct_2_min (coverage 0.2845 low) with news_pct_30min to get real short bursts aligned with trend; ts_backfill for 2-min used due to low coverage. SUGGESTION2 N/A. Confidence: 0.48

results.idea: Post-news elevated volatility continuation
results.description: Use news_atr14 times news_pct_30min: larger ATR days with movement tend to continue. SUGGESTION1 used. ATR coverage high so no backfill. Confidence: 0.55

results.idea: Cross-sectional extremum of post-news 90min move
results.description: zscore(news_pct_90min) to capture cross-sectionally extreme directional moves. SUGGESTION1 lightly considered. Confidence: 0.53

results.idea: Pre/post-session VWAP drift (main vs all sessions)
results.description: Subtract news_main_vwap from news_all_vwap to detect session-specific drift; SUGGESTION1 used. Both coverage high. Confidence: 0.51

results.idea: Momentum in small ebbing volume (thin continuation)
results.description: news_pct_10min divided by news_mov_vol to favor moves in thin names (greater signal). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.54

results.idea: After-hours rapid move leads to reversal at open
results.description: Use nws12_afterhsz_1_minute high values reversed at open; SUGGESTION1 single field, coverage moderate. Confidence: 0.48

results.idea: EPS-driven volume surge continuation
results.description: Multiply news_eps_actual (surprise proxy) by news_curr_vol to detect EPS with follow-through. SUGGESTION1 used; both fields coverage good. Confidence: 0.60

results.idea: Intraday range breakout measured against 30d range
results.description: Divide news_session_range by ts_backfill(news_range_stddev,5) to normalize by recent range volatility; applied ts_backfill since coverage 0.268 for session_range_pct. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.50

results.idea: Rapid 30-second move confirmed by 1-minute move
results.description: Multiply news_pct_30sec and news_pct_1min to emphasize confirmation. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.57

results.idea: Short-term micro-mean reversion after large 3-min spike
results.description: Reverse news_mins_3_chg (coverage 0.9174) as mean-revert indicator. SUGGESTION2: treated as scalar not vector. Confidence: 0.49

results.idea: Post-news max up amt scaled by market cap
results.description: Divide news_max_upamt by news_cap to prefer impactful moves in small caps. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Momentum persistence measured via ts_ir over 30 days
results.description: Use ts_ir(news_pct_120min,30) to measure information ratio (persistence) of post-news 120min returns. SUGGESTION1 single operator used due to power of ts_ir. Confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Fade when post-news VWAP diverges but volume low
results.description: Reverse to fade when news_post_vwap far from ton last while news_close_vol low; use ts_backfill for low close_vol coverage 0.6909? coverage>0.6 so no backfill used. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.48

results.idea: Open gap continuation in low PE names
results.description: Multiply news_open_gap by inverse(news_pe_ratio) to prefer continuation in cheaply valued stocks. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.53

results.idea: Short-term mean-revert after 4-min directional move
results.description: Reverse news_mins_4_chg which has good coverage (0.9209) to capture micro mean-reverts. SUGGESTION1 minimal. Confidence: 0.50

results.idea: Liquidity-driven continuation: pct_10min * mov_vol
results.description: Multiply news_pct_10min by news_mov_vol to prefer liquid names continuing. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.54

results.idea: Post-news abnormal volume burst reversal
results.description: Use news_vol_stddev to detect abnormal volume; reverse large volume bursts expecting excess volatility and possible mean-revert. SUGGESTION1 single-field. Confidence: 0.46

results.idea: Momentum scaled by market cap (small-cap bias)
results.description: Multiply news_pct_30min by inverse(news_cap) to emphasize small-cap momentum. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.55

results.idea: EOD close drift vs TONLast normalized by 30d stddev
results.description: Divide (news_eod_close - news_ton_last) by news_range_stddev to find unusual close moves. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.56

results.idea: After-hours 10-min percent continuation into next session
results.description: Use nws12_afterhsz_10_min to predict continuation; single field. Coverage moderate. Confidence: 0.47

results.idea: Short momentum + high short interest squeeze long
results.description: Multiply reverse(news_pct_30min) with news_short_interest to identify potential squeezes (shorted stock that fell may rebound). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.59

results.idea: Cross-sectional rank of first-minute reaction
results.description: quantile(news_pct_1min) to create a gaussian-mapped cross-sectional signal. SUGGESTION1 used lightly. Confidence: 0.52

results.description: Reverse news_pct_30min and divide by news_curr_vol to prefer contrarian trades in high-volume moves. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.50

results.description: Multiply news_eps_actual by news_pct_120min to capture EPS magnitude driving sustained moves. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.64

results.idea: Immediate 120-min reversal for extreme positive moves

results.description: Multiply news_pct_1min and news_pct_5_min to reward consistency across small intervals. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.55

results.description: Use news_mins_1_chg (coverage 0.9175) to find fast recoveries and go long. SUGGESTION1 single field. Confidence: 0.51

results.idea: VWAP divergence combined with short interest squeeze potential
results.description: Multiply (news_post_vwap - news_ton_last) with news_short_interest to find large deviations in heavily shorted names. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.58

results.description: reverse(news_mins_3_chg) to capture fast drops followed by bounce potential. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.47

results.idea: Strong 120-min move in low PE stock continuation
results.description: Multiply news_pct_120min by inverse(news_pe_ratio) to favor continuation in cheap names. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.55

results.idea: Pre-open vwap gap per tick intensity
results.description: Divide subtract(news_pre_vwap, news_ton_last) by news_tot_ticks to get per-tick pre-open shift. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.48

results.idea: Earnings day: EPS * vol_stddev (surprise with volume)
results.description: Multiply news_eps_actual by news_vol_stddev to prioritize EPS with unusual volume. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Post-news low-volume spike fade
results.description: Reverse news_pct_10min and multiply by inverse(news_curr_vol) to fade spikes with low current volume. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.46

results.idea: Persistent cross-day post-news move using ts_decay_linear
results.description: Apply ts_decay_linear(news_pct_120min,5) to emphasize recent momentum with decay. SUGGESTION1 single op. Confidence: 0.60

results.idea: Cross-sectional rank of post-news maxdown to find oversold
results.description: quantile(reverse(news_max_dn_ret)) to pick extreme down moves. SUGGESTION1 minimal. Confidence: 0.53

results.idea: Open-volume weighted continuation
results.description: Multiply news_open_gap by news_open_vol (coverage low 0.4361 so ts_backfill applied). SUGGESTION3 used. Confidence: 0.45

results.idea: 30-min move divided by 30-day average true range
results.description: Divide news_pct_30min by news_atr14 to normalize by volatility regime. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.56

results.idea: Post-news direction confirmed by eod_vwap shift
results.description: Multiply news_pct_60min and subtract(news_eod_vwap, news_ton_last) to require both price momentum and vwap shift. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.54

results.idea: Micro squeeze candidate: rapid 1min up with high short interest
results.description: Multiply news_pct_1min and news_short_interest to find potential squeezes. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.57

results.idea: Post-news 90-min zscore cross-day momentum
results.description: ts_zscore(news_pct_90min,5) to measure recent extremeness of 90-min moves. SUGGESTION1 single operator. Confidence: 0.60
